title: The walls are too thin: Quirky tales of nuisance neighbours
description: We all have our share of nuisance neighbours. This book brings some of those relatable incidents together as the narrator describes the ordeal of victims of 'thin walls' using satire and witty imagination.It is fun to read, but barely under the surface, you notice the pain.A themed collection of quirky, witty, tongue-in-cheek flash stories that ends with a lingering thought.
author: Shabana Mukhtar
